name: Swing Guy
description:
A swing platformer where you swing rather than grapple. Currently the game is published I may make a few bug fixes but other than that I have completed the game.Soon I will release a new "episode" if you will about the solar system, as the goal has always been to get the sun for the past game and this one. I do plan to add a level building system in the future, however it may take some time to implement this feature.

- By Nocrom Studios

- Oreo Osborn You Know Who You Are
